diff_hunk:
@@ -8,6 +9,7 @@ set(TEST_SOURCES
 
 add_library(dispatch OBJECT ${LIB_SOURCES})
 target_enable_style_warnings(dispatch)
+target_include_directories(dispatch SYSTEM PUBLIC ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/third_party/flat_hash_map)
body: Since we are not installing third_party/flat_hash_map, and this adds a target include directories that is public, it will cause issues during installation time. Either do installation of flat_hash_map or consider using a different one.
body_html: Since we are not installing third_party/flat_hash_map, and this adds a target include directories that is public, it will cause issues during installation time. Either do installation of flat_hash_map or consider using a different one.
body_text: Since we are not installing third_party/flat_hash_map, and this adds a target include directories that is public, it will cause issues during installation time. Either do installation of flat_hash_map or consider using a different one.
